languages.text: "...и да благослови слугу тво{mf|его|ю} верн{mf|ого|ую}, дабы силы и здравие вернулись в тело, что охраняет границы Империума Человечества..."
"...and bless Thy loyal servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the borders of the Imperium..."
languages.original_text: "...и да благослови слугу тво{mf|его|ю} верн{mf|ого|ую}, дабы силы и здравие вернулись в тело, что охраняет границы Империума Человечества..."

traits.locale_text: "...and bless your faithful servant, that strength and health may return to a body that guards the outer limits of the Imperium of Mankind..."
"...and bless your faithful servant, that strength and health may return to a body that guards the outer limits of the Imperium of Mankind..."
"...and bless your faithful servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the outer limits of the Imperium of Mankind..."
"...and bless your faithful servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the outer limits of the Imperium of Mankind..."
"...and bless Thy loyal servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the borders of the Imperium..."
"...and bless Thy loyal servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the borders of the Imperium..."

languages.text: «... y bendice a Tu leal sirviente, para que el cuerpo que guarda las fronteras del Imperium recupere su fuerza y su salud...».
languages.original_text: "...and bless Thy loyal servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the borders of the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: «... y bendice a Tu leal sirviente, para que el cuerpo que guarda las fronteras del Imperium recupere su fuerza y su salud...».

languages.text: 「…そして忠実なしもべに祝福を。帝国の国境を守る身体に力と健康が戻りますように…」
languages.original_text: "...and bless Thy loyal servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the borders of the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: 「…そして忠実なしもべに祝福を。帝国の国境を守る身体に力と健康が戻りますように…」

languages.text: “……愿神皇保佑祂虔诚的仆人，让守卫帝国边境的人们恢复健康与力量……”
languages.original_text: "...and bless Thy loyal servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the borders of the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: “……愿神皇保佑祂虔诚的仆人，让守卫帝国边境的人们恢复健康与力量……”

languages.text: "... und segne Deinen treuen Diener, damit Stärke und Gesundheit in den Körper zurückkehren, der die Grenzen des Imperiums bewacht ..."
languages.original_text: "...and bless Thy loyal servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the borders of the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: "... und segne Deinen treuen Diener, damit Stärke und Gesundheit in den Körper zurückkehren, der die Grenzen des Imperiums bewacht ..."

languages.text: « ... et bénissez votre fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante}, que le corps de {mf|celui|celle} qui garde les frontières de l'Imperium recouvre force et santé... »
languages.original_text: "...and bless Thy loyal servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the borders of the Imperium..."

traits.locale_text: « ... et bénissez votre fidèle {mf|serviteur|servante}, que le corps de {mf|celui|celle} qui garde les frontières de l'Imperium recouvre force et santé... »

languages.text: "...Ve sadık hizmetkârını kutsa ki güç ve sıhhat, İmparatorluk'un sınırlarını muhafaza eden bedenine geri dönebilsin..."
languages.original_text: "...and bless Thy loyal servant, so strength and health may return to the body that guards the borders of the Imperium..."
